conversations.content: Please buy a smart watch for me.

<|Function_Thought|>
User asked to buy a smart watch. I should first find available smart watches to present options (brand, price, features) so the user can choose. I'll search the product catalog for "smart watch" in Electronics with no price filters to get a broad set of results. Next step: call search_product with product_name "smart watch", category "Electronics".
<|/Function_Thought|>
Calling search_product to find smart watches.
{"name":"search_product","arguments":{"product_name":"smart watch","price":null,"price_min":null,"price_max":null,"brand":null,"category":"Electronics","product_id":null,"rating_min":null,"rating_max":null}}
